Articles.Content:
A Ã¢â‚¬Å“stick it where you wantÃ¢â‚¬Â command unit, prone to homicidal episodes, good to attach on secondary payloads or whatever you want to control. No reaction wheel, sensitive to bad remarks about itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s single red eye!

Requires KAS

Download from Kerbal Stuff

Source: https://www.dropbox.com/s/07ak2g234oumdsl/Kal9000_source.zip?dl=0

A eerie red eye to scare little kerbals!

License is GPLv2

Source code on the ZIP file

Edited August 5, 2015 by IGNOBIL
Update

Open the pod bay doors KAL.

- I'm afraid I can't do that, Jeb.

Open the pod bay doors KAL.

- I'm afraid I can't do that, Jeb.

LOL niceee

Good looking mod, for a second though, I thought (hoped) it was something like Mechjeb's smart A.S.S. but without the autopilot

Does it have built in Kerbal Engineer and Mechjeb support or do we have to mod the config files for that?

Also, it would be nice to have it a little smaller. I know lots of people like the parts bigger so they can grab them easily in the VAB, but I prefer them smaller.

Edited October 27, 2014 by Ruedii

Does it have built in Kerbal Engineer and Mechjeb support or do we have to mod the config files for that?

Also, it would be nice to have it a little smaller. I know lots of people like the parts bigger so they can grab them easily in the VAB, but I prefer them smaller.

I haven't included MechJeb or Kerbal engineer, I have a MM file that puts Mechjeb in all command units.

It's just control, no A.S.S. no MJ, no KE, and no reaction wheel.

I've updated it on Kerbal stuff to half the size, it looked to big to me too!
Looks like a fun thing to have. I'll be using it. Thanks for making the mod.

Looks nice, me likey!

What would it take to give it the same features a mechjeb? ie: Instead of putting the mechjeb unit on the ship, to put this instead?

- - - Updated - - -

Also, do you think you could support a CKAN install?
Does it have the greatest enthusiasm for the mission?
can it sing Daisy Bell?
Errm, is it just me or the KerbalStuff zip does not have part.cfg?

That name...

You knew what you were doing, didn't you.

I just looked at the kal9000.zip from kerbalstuff.com, and it is totally missing the part in the GameData/NAU/Parts directory.

I do see it when I look at the zip file from Dropbox

Thanks, I don't know what happened, I checked on my computer the file was there, disappeared after upload, already changed, cheers!

- - - Updated - - -

That name...

You knew what you were doing, didn't you.

Sure, just my humble homage to one of the greatest movies ever, that got me dreaming with rockets and space far before KSP! I was building rockets out of fertilizer mix and cardboard since I was 8, most of the times resulting in "rapid unplanned dis-assemblies" and some scorched eyebrows.

Looks nice, me likey!

What would it take to give it the same features a mechjeb? ie: Instead of putting the mechjeb unit on the ship, to put this instead?

- - - Updated - - -

Also, do you think you could support a CKAN install?

This is to be just a basic module, I have .cfg files to add mechjeb to all command units, so might not add mechjeb for now.

Regarding CKAN, I still need to look at it, been too busy to work on mods lately!
